snippet: An Istanbul court on Monday released four journalists from jail, where they had been awaiting trial on charges that they were part of a plot to overthrow the government.
abstract: Turkish court releases four journalists from jail, where they had been awaiting trial on charges that they were part of a plot to overthrow the government.
lead_paragraph: An Istanbul court on Monday released four journalists from jail, where they had been awaiting trial on charges that they were part of a plot to overthrow the government.

headline.main: Turkey: Court Frees 4 Journalists Accused in Plot
headline.print_headline: Turkey: Court Frees 4 Journalists Accused in Plot
